main event: A round, white object the size of a quarter coin was seen moving up and down near the horizon and disappeared into clouds after ten minutes.
interesting points: The sighting was confirmed by four other witnesses., The object was first observed through a spotting scope., The object moved in a straight flight path before disappearing., Military aircraft were confirmed to be in the area but at a much higher altitude., The weather conditions were overcast and raining at the time of the sighting.
